Body: After dropping device in water, I am trying to open my galaxy ace camera app, but it doesn't open. rather than it shows a warning message: Warning:    camera failed   ErrorMessageHandler.handleMessage(-1)How can I fix this problem and make camera launches properly, so I can take pics or record videos?
Title: Galaxy ace camera app does not open and shows warning:  ErrorMessageHandler.handleMessage(-1)

history.Text: I am trying to open my galaxy ace camera but it doesn't open. rather than it shows a warning message:     Warning:        camera failed       ErrorMessageHandler.handleMessage(-1)How can I fix this problem and make camera launches properly?
Galaxy ace camera does not open and shows warning

I am trying to open my galaxy ace camera but it doesn't open. rather than it shows a warning message:     Warning:        camera failed       ErrorMessageHandler.handleMessage(-1)How can I fix this problem and make camera launches properly, so I can take pics or record videos?
